body_html: @wt-huang OK, I messed the example up, so it was unclear: the code above is ran from Colab notebook, so first the model CuDNNLSTM is initialized in one cell, I get an error, then I initialize the regular LSTM model in another cell and I get an error from the re-initialized model. See the relevant Colab notebook (fixed example).

body: @wt-huang OK, I messed the example up, so it was unclear: the code above is ran from Colab notebook, so first the model `CuDNNLSTM` is initialized in one cell, I get an error, then I initialize the regular `LSTM` model *in another cell* and I get an error from the re-initialized model. See the [relevant Colab notebook (fixed example)](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1fhsUfxAdtG2lTTYndhcr8Y9924IPYkiJ).
